		nop
		ldi r0, 1
		out r0, 0 // dir reg   00000001 	

poll:	in r0, 2  // read pin register
		ani r0, 2
		jnz clear

		ldi r0, 1
		out r0, 1
		jmp poll

clear:  ldi r0, 0
	    out r0, 1
		jmp poll



0000000000000000
0000000000010001
0000000000000100

0000000000100010
0000000000100011
1000000010110000
0000000000001011

0000000000010001
0000000000010100
0000000010110000
0000000000000011

0000000000000001
0000000000010100
0000000010110000
0000000000000011
